alert.note: Alert for Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:51PM EDT until March 31 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN STARKE AND NORTHERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 651 PM EDT/551 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamlet, or near Knox, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Bremen, Knox, Hamlet, Koontz Lake, La Paz, Teegarden, Donaldson, Linkville, Lake Of The Woods, Tyner and Grovertown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
